name: Two Worlds (itch) (French Dev)
description:
In this game, you have to help Jonas to download an IA stuck in another world. It's a little puzzle game made in the Wowie Game Jam 4.0.

Credits : 

  • Dev : Noé Berges
  • Artist : Simon LeDuc
  • Thanks : Arthur

Music made with MuseNet MIDI Tool (mrcheeze.github.io)

You can download the sounds in Two Worlds Soundtrack by French Dev (itch.io).
